On 9/18/06, isowitz <isowitz@...> wrote:
> I have a short question. Is it good to make a assertTrue(), assertEquals
> () etc. in the setUp() or tearDown() methode?
>

I sometimes assert something that I know to be implicitly true but
will not be obviously true to a future reader of the test.

assertTrue(objectUnderTest.readyForTesting())

Kevin
